metadata.value: Job Title: Senior Software Engineer Location: 10770 NE 8th Street, Suite 700, Bellevue, WA 98004 *Telecommuting permitted: work may be performed within normal commuting distance from The Trade Desk office in Bellevue, WA. Job Duties: Design and implement scalable software components and infrastructure within internal developer platforms and distributed systems to enhance engineering productivity and reliability. Optimize and refactor existing tooling, services, and workflows to reduce developer friction and improve system performance, fault tolerance, and maintainability across engineering teams. Conduct comprehensive technical design and code reviews for high-impact systems, ensuring architectural alignment, adherence to secure coding practices, and performance efficiency. Serve as a technical advisor to guide software design patterns and best practices across teams. Lead cross-functional technical initiatives by scoping and executing complex projects that span multiple services, teams, and domains, including dependency resolution, phased rollouts, and backward compatibility. Develop reusable frameworks and internal APIs to enable standardized integration and extensibility across the company’s engineering organization; own shared libraries or SDKs used by multiple services and teams. Use telemetry, logs, and operational data to identify bottlenecks, quantify the impact of engineering investments, and drive decisions around prioritization and architectural improvements. Salary: $212,202 - $274,700 / year Job Requirements: Master's degree (U.S. or foreign equivalent) in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related field and five (5) years of experience in the job offered or related role OR Bachelor’s degree (U.S. or foreign equivalent) in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or related field and seven (7) years of experience in the job offered or related role. Must have five (5) year of experience with: REST APIs or gRPC; and Java, C#, or C++. Must have four (4) year of experience with: Microsoft SQL Server or MySQL; Grafana and Prometheus; AWS, including SQS, EC2, CloudTrail, IAM, AWS Autoscaling, CloudWatch, ECS and EKS; Kubernetes and Docker Container; and S3 or Azure Blob Storage.
